# Simple usage

```{r}
library(MsBackendRawFileReader)

fls <- rep(rawfile <- file.path(path.package(package = 'MsBackendRawFileReader'), 'extdata', 'sample.raw'), 1)

be <- backendInitialize(MsBackendRawFileReader(), files = fls)

sps_thermofinnigan <- Spectra(be)
sps_thermofinnigan
```
